title: Pledge logo font? Anybody?
content:
Hey now, I'm totally jonesin to know this font. Some assistance would be appreciated. Even little to no assistance is fine too. Maybe some assistance in assistance...? Lol. Anyway, here it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100910020600im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pledge.jpg)
author: WhoHa

comments.content: I think this is a custom designed logo. Maybe we can come up with something similar.
That's what I figured. I'm going to see about that too.
